artist: Delineator: After Claude Gellée (called Le Lorrain); Engraver: Richard Earlom; Publisher: John Boydell
description: pastoral scene with herder seated on a large rock watching a flock of goats and cows at a river; large tree on far bank of river; cliff with building on top in right distance
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: Claude de Lorrain delin.   R. Earlom fecit/ No. 08  Published May 1 1775 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside | on sheet in pencil: 1-674
